welcome.introText1: Softcodes is your new AI coding agent.
welcome.introText2: It works with the latest AI models like Claude 4 Sonnet, Gemini 2.5 Pro, GPT-4.1, and 450+ more.
welcome.introText3: Create your account and get free requests to use across any AI model.

allowVeryLargeReads.label: Allow very large file reads
allowVeryLargeReads.description: When enabled, Softcodes will perform very large file or MCP output reads even if there is a high chance of overflowing the context window (content size >80% of context window).

systemNotifications.label: Enable System Notifications
systemNotifications.description: When enabled, Softcodes will send system notifications for important events like task completion or errors.
systemNotifications.testMessage: This is a test notification from Softcodes.

condense.wantsToCondense: Softcodes wants to condense your conversation

description.rules: Rules allow you to provide Softcodes with instructions it should follow in all modes and for all prompts. They are a persistent way to include context and preferences for all conversations in your workspace or globally.
description.workflows: Workflows are a prepared template for a conversation. Workflows can allow you to define prompts you use frequently, and can include a series of steps to guide Softcodes through repetitive tasks, such as deploying a service or submitting a PR. To invoke a workflow, type

validation.invalidFileExtension: Only .md, .txt, or no file extension allowed

ideaSuggestionsBox.suggestionText: <suggestionButton>Click here</suggestionButton> for a cool idea, then tap on <sendIcon /> and watch me do magic!

ideas.idea1: Make a spinning, glowing 3D sphere that responds to mouse movements. Make the app work in the browser.
ideas.idea2: Create a portfolio website for a Python software developer
ideas.idea3: Create a financial app mockup in the browser. Then test if it works
ideas.idea4: Create a directory website containing the best AI video generation models currently
ideas.idea5: Create a CSS gradient generator that exports custom stylesheets and shows a live preview
ideas.idea6: Generate cards that reveal dynamic content beautifully when hovered over
ideas.idea7: Create a calming interactive starfield that moves with mouse gestures
